root.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Sewer Run
root.description: Although it plays differently and the sprites no longer retain the glow-and-black aesthetic in the actual gameplay, Sewer Run takes place directly after Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Dark Horizons. The opening cutscene is of Leatherhead's defeat in the previous game.

similar_games.game: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Dark Horizons
